parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return child control with specified idc.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Control]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> display '''displayCtrl''' idc

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display: [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Control]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ChildControl = _ParentDisplay [[displayCtrl]] 101;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[findDisplay]], [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlPosition]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]], [[displayParent]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 1, 2017 - 03:44 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Demellion|Demellion]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
Since '''Arma 3 1.42''' you can also return a control inside a controls group using [[controlsGroupCtrl]] (created with [[ctrlCreate]] or inside a controls[] of a control config). Example:
<code>((uiNamespace getVariable "RscUnitInfo") displayCtrl 2303) controlsGroupCtrl 154; // Display -> Controls Group -> Control</code>
Note that control inside controls group having '''-1 IDC''' currently cannot be returned in any way.
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
